name: Hidden World of Art
storyline: Lana was the best student in art school and now she is swamped by customers with monumental expectations. She is tasked with restoring the classic paintings crafted by masterful artists spanning four centuries. Help Lana restore around fifty well known paintings by finding and revealing the mysterious objects hidden within the layers of paint.
summary:
